WRITING.TEXT: Ghetto classic, coast to coast recorded in Alabama. "I'm Your Puppet" from 1966, reached number six in the US Billboard Hot 100 chart and in a re-recorded version number 12 in the UK Singles Chart (in April 1976)

WRITING.TITLE: James Bobby Purify - I'm Your Puppet
Liam Lynch - United States of Whatever

WRITING.TEXT:
This is real. I am a natural born NYC boy who unfortunately was born with Hemophilia. Our treatment (Factor VIII) was isolated from blood donors and became worth more than gold. The suppliers tried to find the cheapest sources of blood and decided to go to US prisoners and shelters to get people willing to donate often - sometimes 3 times a day.
About 10,000 hemophiliacs became infected alone due to greed.
PBS has a documentary entitled 'Red Gold' http://www.pbs.org/wnet/redgold/ And HBO released a great film entitled 'And the band played on..." http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-o_8aQx4r8
